system.description: Can spend 1 minute removing the skin of a humanoid dead for less than 24 hours. Skin-stealer can don or remove a stolen skin in place of an attack. When wearing a stolen skin, the skin-stealer impersonates the skin's original owner, including the victim's voice, but gains none of the creatureâ€™s abilities or memories. A skin-stealer can collect up to 6 skins, which are preserved and remain as supple as living skin.
